name: Black Market
description:
This demo was inspired by VHS/PSX era of classical Japaneses horror games. It has ‘tank controls’ and fixed camera. Issues with animations are included ;D

It's short and lacking any plot details so..

NOTE! Very serious story ahead!

Try to put yourself in a role of a currency trader on the black market.
Yet another successful deal at midnight and it's time to go home.
What could go wrong ?

Controls

Keyboard : AWD - run, R.ALT - sprint, Mouse1 - shoot, ESC - restart
Gamepad (dualshock) : LS - run, Circle - sprint, Cross - shoot, L2 - restart
Gamepad (x360) : LS - run, B - sprint, A - shoot, LT - restart

4:3 aspect ration is very recommended.
Also, please don't put Very Low quality. In this case all character models get disappeared due to LODs
